soccer ball.A3:
Give a generalization for the word soccer ball: soccer ball = (rubber + plastic) – seams. The equation is: ball = (rubber + plastic) – seams.

### Chapter 13: The Power of the Equation

The equation ball = (rubber + plastic) – seams now becomes a tool for analyzing and comparing different balls. The equation allows for the examination of the effects of different components on the ball’s performance. For example, a ball with more rubber will have better bounce, but a ball with more plastic will be more durable. The equation also allows for the evaluation of different brands of balls
